channel.title: The Secret Wood
channel.description: A children's book, free to download.

item.title: New Podcast
item.description: Listen to the first three chapters of The Secret Wood read aloud by S.G. Overton. Subscribe to our podcast to hear future chapters.

item.title: Web Site Launched
item.description: The website for The Secret Wood has launched at http://thesecretwood.com. The first three chapters of the book are now available for free, under the terms of a Creative Commons license.
